alert.note: Alert for Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 8:54AM MDT until June 09 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Billings MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Musselshell River near Roundup affecting Musselshell County. .Recent heavy rainfall has caused a rapid rise on the Musselshell River at Roundup, which is expected to peak a little above flood stage around midday today. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Musselshell River near Roundup. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM MDT Friday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage by midday today, then fall back below flood stage this afternoon. The river is expected to remain below flood stage through the weekend, though locally heavy additional rain is possible today, so please monitor the forecast for changes. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (noon) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Musselshell River Roundup 10.0 9.8 Fri 8 am 10.3 8.2 7.9 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency officials and request they pass the information to the National Weather Service in Billings. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. The latest stages and forecasts for rivers and streams can be found at our web page: https://water.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 415 PM MDT.
